trans-unit.source: Contains the data sent to a tracking service by the runtime tracking infrastructure when an <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint"></xref> is matched.
It is also used in the return list of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents"></xref> property.

When the runtime tracking infrastructure matches an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>, it sends an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> to the tracking service over the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> associated with that tracking service.
The tracking service can perform whatever action is needed on the data in the tracking record.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"></xref> class.
This constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"></xref> class by using the specified parameters.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the activity associated with the activity status event.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName"></xref> of the activity associated with the activity status event.
The <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that identifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> of the activity associated with the activity status event.

The <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that identifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> of the parent activity of the activity associated with the activity status event.
One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> that indicates the date and time of the activity status event associated with the tracking record.
The relative order in which the activity status event associated with this tracking record occurred in the workflow instance.
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
This field is not set for an <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"></xref>.
Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the activity associated with this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"></xref>.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.ActivityType%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the activity for which this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"></xref> was created.
Gets the collection of annotations associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint"></xref> that was matched.
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref> that contains the annotations that are associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint"></xref> that corresponds to this tracking record.
Gets a list that contains any data extracted from the workflow for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint"></xref> that was matched.
When an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure can extract data from the workflow instance.
The data to be extracted is specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A?displayProperty=fullName> can contain two kinds of objects: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects specify member data to be extracted from the activity associated with the activity status event; and, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects specify member data to be extracted from the root activity of the workflow.
Both of these extract types can also specify annotations to be returned with the extracted data.

The runtime tracking infrastructure encapsulates each piece of extracted data and its associated annotations in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>, and adds this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A>.
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
A list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem"></xref> objects each of which contains a single piece of extracted data and its associated annotations.
Context of the activity.
<xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that identifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> of the activity associated with the activity status event.
Always `null` for an <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"></xref>.
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> has no meaning for an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> and is always a null reference (`Nothing`).
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
A null reference (`Nothing`) for an <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"></xref>.
Gets or sets the date and time that the activity status event occurred.
The <xref:System.DateTime> is Greenwich Mean Time (UTC).
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventDateTime%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> value.
Gets or sets a value that indicates the order in the workflow instance of the activity status event that matched the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint"></xref>.

<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> indicates the relative order of the event that matched the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> within the workflow instance.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> is unique within a workflow instance, but it is not guaranteed to be sequential.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
A value that indicates the order of the activity status event in the workflow instance.
Gets or sets the execution status of the activity associated with this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"></xref>.
A workflow instance only emits activity status events when the execution status of an activity instance changes.
Therefore an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> can only be matched when an activity execution status change occurs.

<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.ExecutionStatus%2A> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus?displayProperty=fullName> that triggered the match and caused the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> to be sent.
It reflects the current status of the activity instance.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.ExecutionStatus%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
Context of the parent activity.
<xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that identifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> of the activity associated with the activity status event.
Gets or sets the identifier of the activity associated with this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"></xref>.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.QualifiedName%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> for which this tracking record was created.
